title: Ping Spikes After the 7.12 update
body: **The Game is awesome, I love it. After these updates, I have been seeing soo much lag. I swear, I played csgo, and got like 40 ping. Then I play league of legends, and spikes to like 200. This has caused my ping and gameplay to be really bad. Please help me as soon as possible, I'm sorry if I am being annoying, but I never post anything on the forums anyways L:)

replies.body: I'm glad you're enjoying the game, though it can't be a great experience having those lag spikes.  :/  It sounds like you could have an unstable connection specifically reaching the game server.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) which will offer a better analysis of your specific issue.  Let me know what you find and we can go from there!
